title: Odell Beckham Jr, Antonio Brown, Tom Brady and the Presser Cooker!
itunes:title: Odell Beckham Jr, Antonio Brown, Tom Brady and the Presser Cooker!
description:
Cleveland Browns wide receiver Odell Beckham Jr.'s watch saga continues to tick away needlessly and Colin argues that Odell's punishment for wearing a watch is justified. Also, Colin urges us all to hold off on buying into these "boy genius" head coaches in the NFL--most of them got outsmarted by veteran coaches in Week 1.  And FOX Sports college football analyst Joel Klatt stops by to discuss various topics in college football's Top 25.  Finally, the Presser Cooker!  Other guests include: Nick Wright of FS1's First Things First, former NFL quarterback and Herd contributor Bruce Gradkowski and FOX Sports NFL analyst LaVar Arrington. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
